field.name: Types

definition.attribution: Digital Learning Sciences at the University Corporation for Atmospheric Research

field.definition: A list characterizing the nature of the content of the resource as chosen from a controlled vocabulary list and/or user defined terms.

dos.practice: Type includes terms describing general categories, functions, genres, or aggregation levels for content. Recommended best practice is to select a value from a controlled vocabulary. To describe the physical or digital manifestation of the resource, use the Format element.
